title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Computer-Assisted Language Learning Utilizing Learner-Autonomy-Based Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can infer the contextual meaning of a target language with over 80% accuracy through interaction with native speakers in a virtual environment.
Learners can establish and execute a self-directed language learning plan at least three times a week using a mobile app.
Learners can derive five principles of designing language activities based on virtual environments through collaboration with peer teachers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
